about_the_game:
Spice up your adventure with explorer Svetlana and her unique abilities including fleeing enemies, setting up camps and insta-murdering mimics!

To make sure you've installed our DLC properly, go to your Steam client and click on:
Sexy Heroine! Part 2 > Properties > DLC

To use the DLC click on the following link and check the folder Svetlana DLC:
Sexy Heroine! Part 2 > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files

Download and copy our special savefile directly from the Svetlana DLC folder and paste it to:
C:\Users[Name]\AppData\Roaming\SEXY HEROINE! PART 2\Saves

name: Sexy Heroine 2 SVETLANA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
